response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to share this treasure. We propose to offer it to you at a price of $1,200,000. This figure encapsulates not only the market value but also the profound impact this product could have on your endeavors. We trust this offer reflects the true worth and potential of the product to you. Should you be interested, please let us know promptly so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
